string-array.name: firstlaunch_descriptions
string-array.item: Catching a train or waiting for someone? View departures and arrivals
Wherever you want to go, plan a route using Hyperrail. Favorites and recent searches are stored for quick access
Long click a result to get more possibilities
Store a result in a notification. Notifications will not update automatically (yet), so keep this in mind!
Create a shortcut to a station, route or train to look them up in one touch!
Are you a routes or departures person? Two, Four, or zero favourites? Customize the app however you want using the settings menu
